preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 94.55 g of Barium Carbonate using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 39.00 g of Lithium Carbonate. 
 3. Measure 88.00 g of Phosphorus Pentoxide. 
 4. Combine all dry ingredients in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing container.
